features: 420D nylon with special carbonate coating for extra abrasion/water resistance
External pocket can stash footwear and reverses to stow away the entire duffel
Haul bag-inspired flat base enables stand-up design
Two internal secure zip mesh pockets plus a large exterior secure zip pocket
Contoured, foam-padded shoulder straps offer a comfortable carry and remove when not needed
Shoulder straps join to form center grab point and are removable
Foam injected tubular webbing grab handle on each side for easy handling or lash point
Internal compression system effectively reduces volume as needed to keep any size load stable
Reflective accents on shoulder straps and front panel
Primary Fabric: 420D Carbonate Coated, Ripstop Nylon (100% Nylon)
Bottom Fabric: 840D Ht Ballistic Plain, Weave Nylon (100% Nylon)
Lining: 150D Recycled Plain Weave, Polyester (100% Recycled Polyester)
